{{Infobox dungeon |name = Giant Chasm |image = [[File:Giant Chasm.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Giant Chasm. |tokens = 266,500 |location = Unova Route 22 }} '''Giant Chasm''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Unova]]. It initially has 81 tiles arranged in an 9x9 square, including 9 chest tiles, 21 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. ==Pokémon and Dungeon Stats== {| class="wikitable" |- !
